body.name: Hydrapeak 50oz Insulated Large Water Bottle - Leak Proof Stainless Steel Water Flask, Double Wall Vacuum Insulation Keeps Drinks COLD for 24 Hours and HOT for 12 Hours (Graphite)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: All Day Insulation: These stainless steel water bottles keep your beverages cold for up to 24 hours and hot for 12 thanks to Hydrapeak's double walled vacuum insulation. These insulated water bottles are great for school, sports, outdoors, and more.

Premium Materials: Hydrapeak's reusable water bottles are made from 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that's easy to clean and does not retain any odors, it features a durable and colorful eye-catching powder coating that's made to last and won't fade.

Leak-Proof and Sweat-Proof: Hydrapeak created this sports water bottle so that whatever you put in, stays in. Carry these metal water bottles with confidence without worrying about leaks, spills, or sweating, thanks to their innovative design.

Easy Drinking: The newly designed Chug lid of our leakproof water bottles was made to give you easy access to your beverages by providing a smooth and consistent drinking flow. The lid has an integrated twist-off cap and flexible carry handle.

Lifetime Guarantee: Hydrapeak products are made to last a lifetime, so we include a limited lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects. We will replace any of our products found to be defective based on normal wear and use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Single BEST Amazon purchase EVER!
reviews.reviewText: There is 0 to dislike. 0 regrets! 1) I knew when ordering this would not fit in a car cup holder, it's 50oz after all. I felt like I was trusting the reviews about how long this keeps ice cold. The reviews were dead accurate. This keeps ice in a hot parked car in 100+ degree heat for DAYS! If only they could make ice chests like this. This has a wide mouth that makes cleaning easy and getting large ice cubes in a cinch. The mouth could possibly fit other similar size lids if you want one with a straw, although I'm happy with the twist open spout. You would have to trim the straw to fit properly, but who cares? This is hands down the best value, best quality, best product on Amazon. If you need to stay hydrated on hot summer days, BUY THIS ONE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peak Hydration acheival
reviews.reviewText: I have climbed the mountain of hydration, and reached a peak that was till now assumed to not exist. With 50 oz of cold water available at all times my kidneys have grown to superhuman capacity as they filter every toxin from my body. My blood is now able to reverse the aging process in others. While this unit is able to keep water cold for hours or even days, the availability will drive you to consume more that you believed possible. I am immune to hangovers and sunburn. The handle will fit 3 fingers to aid in carrying the tremendous mass of water comfortable. The girth of this unit is truly imposing, and when set down on a conference table will exert dominance over all others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps water cold
reviews.reviewText: Love this brand of bottles. We have several and the lids can fit the all other bottled. No leakage. Well-insulated…water stays cold for hours plus the ice lasts hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it!!! It keeps my water nice and cool. And it supplies me my water for the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I owned one of these before and had it for a long period of time. Bought this one and it is just as good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps hot hot & cold cold PLUS it's solidly built
reviews.reviewText: The headline says it all.It's designed in New York & made in China. Strong handle. Water tight but it's still easy to open. My hands are medium-sized for a male, & I can pick it up with one hand & drink from it.It does a great job of keeping liquids at just the right temperature for a goodly number of hours -- that's its job & it does it. So there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I fill this up with ice and water. Sometimes I forget about it and a couple of day later the water is still cold and sometimes still has ice in it! Love it!
Muy bonito color, buen material, mantiene las bebidas frías. Un poco incómodo porque no tiene agarradera y si está lleno pesa mucho pero no afecta tanto.No se resbala y la tapa funciona muy bien

reviews.reviewTitle: Hydropeak only warranties those bought in the U.S. not in Canada.
reviews.reviewText: I called them as my new bottle I had from last xmas had a small crack in the straw stem. So, I asked for warranty and because I bought it in Canada and live in Canada they will not support any warranty outside of the U.S. I was completely baffled as to why but they said they only support their products in the US. I could purchase a new straw for almost $25 cad to replace the straw that was with a hairline crack. I said I'm not stupid, why would I ever buy anymore of their products if they won't honor any warranty. I rather find another product that is supported and is sold in Canada as well as parts too. I don't recommend them and only give them one star because of their policy on warranty. They will sell us all the parts and products we want but won't support them at all. Buyer beware!...they are a quality product and it's a shame they won't support them but in the end, why waste your money, buy another product that sells parts and accessories in Canada with warranty! Cheers!
Excelente termo, mantiene el agua fría por horas y horas…
